ISSUE.TITLE: Gitness website Contribution
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, gitness team your website is awesome and cool I would like to have the opportunity to contribute but I am finding it difficult to find the gitness.com repo. I would appreciate the assistance cloning the repo of it is open source.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: [AH-979]: move filtering rule to security section in registry configuration form (#3461) * feat: [AH-979]: fix failing unit tests * feat: [AH-979]: move filtering rule to security section in registry configuration form

COMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: [CODE-2987]: Add codeowners as reviewers (#3439) * Handle violations in branch CreatePullReqVerify * Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/main' into dd/codeowner-reviewers * Add PullReq infix to Create rule interface and dedup reviewers in PR create * Add create field to pullreq field in rule def * Add codeowners as reviewers
